prompts: Create an electric-type Pokemon with a striking black and white coat and a playful demeanor.
Design a small quadruped Pokemon that resembles a zebra, featuring bright blue highlights.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies speed, with a sleek body and electrifying patterns.
Imagine a Pokemon that roams grassy plains, with a unique black and white color scheme.
Generate a creature that sparks joy, resembling a cute electric horse with vibrant accents.
Make a character with a bold presence, showcasing lightning-like features and a dynamic pose.
Give me a Pokemon that combines agility and charm, perfect for a forest or urban setting.
